ru.yandex.yandexmapkit
Class MapController

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ru.yandex.yandexmapkit.MapController
public class MapController
extends java.lang.Object

MapController.java: The map controller. This class contains the instance of the map model (MapModel) and the OverlayManager which is created by the MapController constructor. The controller handles user events (the onTouchEvent() method) and sends them to the OverlayManager to control layers. If required, it can change the map using scrollMapToPoint(), zoomIn() and other methods. It also handles OnMapListener map events and sends messages to all listeners of these events.

This file is a part of the Yandex Map Kit.

Version for Android Â© 2012 YANDEX

You may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
You may obtain a copy of the License at http://legal.yandex.ru/mapkit/
